### All the essentials in one integrated app

  * Automate billing and payments 
  * Send real-time messages to staff and families 
  * Efficiently run your program with check-in, admissions, reports, and multi-site management 
  * Support educators in and out of the classroom with curriculum, lesson plans, and observations 
  * Automatically sync time tracking with payroll for easy, accurate payroll processing 

Learn more

“We chose brightwheel when we were evaluating different tools because it
integrates billing, admissions, and a great visual experience for families.
It’s awesome that it’s an all-in-one system.”  
  
Brandyn B, Co-Founder of Magnolia Forest Preschools  
Puget Sound, WA

### Simplify billing and get paid faster

  * Easily set up and automate billing 
  * Give families a way to securely pay tuition online 
  * Track subsidy payments across multiple agencies 
  * Stay on top of your finances and year-end taxes 

Learn more

“95% of families are on track with their payments, thanks to brightwheel!
Before, it was really bad. Parents love that they can see exactly how much
they owe, right on their phones.”  
  
Munisha M, Director at Excelsior University for Children  
Seabrook, TX

### Build quality connections with families and staff

  * Give staff an easy tool to communicate with families, administrators, and other staff 
  * Centralize messaging, newsletters, and alerts 
  * Share milestones, photos, and videos 

Learn more

“Brightwheel has been a tremendous blessing. I’ve received great feedback from

Birmingham, AL

### Support child development in and out of the classroom

  * Save time with tools to add, customize, and distribute your own curriculum 
  * Add Experience Curriculum to enhance program quality with digital lessons and hands-on learning materials 
  * Make it easier for staff to observe and share a child’s developmental benchmarks with families 

Learn more

### Efficiently manage your center

  * Centralize family and staff information 
  * Manage your admissions process and waitlist online 
  * Stay compliant with digital check-in, health checks, and room ratio tracking and run reports quickly

### Automate your Payroll with ease

  * Easily track upcoming & past payrolls
